name: AirMyne
headline: Building systems to remove carbon dioxide from air at industrial scale
description: AirMyne is building machines to capture & remove carbon dioxide from ambient atmospheric air so it can be utilized or sequestered downstream. Our team is based in Berkeley, CA.

founders.name: Mark Cyffka, Founder
founders.description: Cleantech commercialization leader. Helped invent, scale, & sell products used in EV, solar, semiconductor, & display manufacturing. Formerly served as Product Manager at Chemetall-BASF & R&D Engineer at Honeywell. Trained at Harvey Mudd College (Chemistry) & Babson College (MBA).

founders.name: Sudip Mukhopadhyay, Founder
founders.description: Deep tech innovator helped bringing billions of revenue-Helped developing low global warming refrigerant, 1234yf for cars. Developed products and commercialized in Solar, Semi, Displays and Quantum Dot TV applications. Founding member of Honeywell drone and air taxi greenhouses/startups, Also worked with 100s of startup in deep tech from Finland.

# For a cooler future.
**Scaling high-quality carbon removal through Direct Air Capture.**
## We’re building a practical Direct Air Capture approach—and sidestepping common barriers to scale.
[ Our Technology ](http://www.airmyne.com/</technology>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/e200fd30-e25e-46c3-b96e-b88156dff26a/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Industrial-EnergyEfficient.png)
**ENERGY EFFICIENT**
AirMyne’s process is primarily powered by low-temperature heat, allowing us to use waste steam from industrial or geothermal sources.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/4314259d-80ab-4013-8c10-20e57edc151b/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Future-Proof.png)
**SCALABLE**
Our system inputs are cheap and easy to procure, and our chemical formulation is benign and poses low fire-risk.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/5a828884-02cc-4078-9fff-c03cc03ef683/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Industrial-Expertise.png)
**INDUSTRIAL EXPERTISE**
We have already invented and scaled successful climate solutions — we know what’s needed to get the job done.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/afc68ed6-983c-43f0-b671-55c0db9291fe/Airmyne-DAC-Prototype3.jpg)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/598c5460-dea5-4f6c-a28a-30cb044010ba/Airmyne-DAC-Prototype4.jpg)
## We believe that restoring the climate is one of the most meaningful challenges of our generation.
AirMyne is a team of engineers, scientists, and problem-solvers on a mission to mitigate the reach of climate change. We believe Direct Air Capture will play a critical role in the battle against climate change in the years to come.
[ OUR TEAM ](http://www.airmyne.com/</about>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/9456502e-21c5-41c7-98d4-18f5cf987a19/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Climate.png)
**WE’RE CLIMATE-FIRST**
We’re committed to decarbonization. We do not believe in using Direct Air Capture as a guise to continue extracting fossil fuels.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/6a5994a4-a2a6-474c-a34f-81f356ed1541/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Dont-Overpromise.png)
**WE DON’T OVERPROMISE**
We’re realistic about our technology—any claims we make are rooted in real data.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/b2fb4903-16f0-416c-9aeb-9f902ce86570/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Grounded.png)
**WE’RE HUMBLE**
We’re a low-ego team—we have much to learn, and we remain skeptical of all approaches until thoroughly vetted by rigorous experimentation.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/4b382172-f5f0-4bd7-833f-8a4a7e6e8930/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Prototype.png)
**WE PROTOTYPE FAST**
We prototype fast, and often—we believe rapid experimentation is the best way to engineer an effective approach.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/d78a639a-203b-41f8-86e6-4fe4371ea415/Airmyne-DAC-Icon-Expand.png)
**WE EXPAND THE TENT**
We want to make Direct Air Capture transparent and accessible to all.
## Partner With Us
We’re working with industry partners and other critical organizations to scale our technology. If you’re interested in joining us (as a partner, employee, advisor, or investor), drop us a note!
[ Contact Us ](http://www.airmyne.com/</contact>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/efd7a36b-f338-4bc9-8f6f-a6399096236a/Airmyne-DAC-PackingMaterial.jpg)
[**HOME**](http://www.airmyne.com/</home>)
[**TECHNOLOGY**](http://www.airmyne.com/</technology>)
[**ABOUT**](http://www.airmyne.com/</about>)
[**CONTACT**](http://www.airmyne.com/</contact>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/658364951ebc22517ab52fc5/216749c7-e317-4811-bd12-395c26ba716b/Airmyne-Direct-Air-Capture-Icon.png)
**© AIRMYNE 2024**
[**PRIVACY POLICY**](http://www.airmyne.com/</privacy-policy>)
[**TERMS OF SERVICE**](http://www.airmyne.com/</terms-of-service>)

generated_description:
AirMyne is a forward-thinking startup founded in 2022, based in Berkeley, California, and is part of the Y Combinator Batch W22. Their mission is straightforward yet crucial: to build systems for removing carbon dioxide from the atmosphere at an industrial scale, a necessary step in combating climate change.

The team at AirMyne, currently numbering 11, consists of engineers, scientists, and dedicated problem-solvers who are committed to developing effective and efficient solutions in carbon capture technology. They emphasize a practical approach to Direct Air Capture (DAC), aiming to address the typical hurdles this technology faces as it scales. 

What sets AirMyne apart? For one, their process is energy efficient, leveraging low-temperature heat—often sourced from waste steam from industrial processes or geothermal energy. This scalability is reinforced by the use of inexpensive and readily available materials in their systems, which are designed with simplicity and safety in mind.

AirMyne’s team brings considerable industrial expertise, having already made strides in successful climate solutions; they understand what’s required to tackle these challenges head-on. They maintain a "climate-first" stance, advocating for genuine decarbonization rather than using DAC as a crutch for ongoing fossil fuel extraction.

Importantly, AirMyne prides itself on its humility and realistic expectations. They don’t promise more than their technology can deliver, and their claims are grounded in rigorous data. This sensible approach extends to their rapid prototyping and experimentation ethos—essentially learning and iterating quickly to refine their methods.

As they look to the future, AirMyne is eager to expand their network, inviting partners, investors, and advisors who share their vision of transparency in Direct Air Capture technology. 

If you're intrigued or want to learn more about their innovative approach to carbon capture, you can explore their initiatives further on their website: [AirMyne](http://www.airmyne.com).
